faq.title: FAQ
faq.lead: Frequently asked questions about Penyes and our Penya in Graz.

q1.title: What is a Penya? (FC Barcelona Penya)
q1.text: A Penya is an official FC Barcelona supporters’ club — an organized group of fans who share their passion for the club. Penyes exist worldwide and provide a way to watch matches together, organize events, and live the club’s values — especially the connection to Catalan culture and the motto “Més que un club”.

q2.title: When and why does it make sense to join a Penya?
q2.text: Joining a Penya makes sense if you want to share your enthusiasm for FC Barcelona with like-minded people and be part of a strong community. In a Penya you don’t experience matches alone, but in a lively atmosphere with other fans. You can join events, build friendships, and experience the passion for the club in a new way. You also support Barça’s values and traditions.

q3.title: What are the benefits of being a Penya member?
q3.li1: Watching matches together with a real fan atmosphere
q3.li2: Access to fan events, trips and special activities
q3.li3: Discounts on merchandise and tickets (depending on availability/promotions)
q3.li4: A way to support the club and live its culture and traditions
q3.li5: Connect with fans worldwide and make new friends
q3.li6: Official recognition as part of the Barça family

join.title: Join
join.lead: Here is a simple step-by-step guide on how to become a member of our Penya.
join.step2Text: Fill out the membership form completely. Pay special attention to fields that must be signed at the end.
join.step3Text: Please sign all required places. Without a signature we cannot process the application.
join.step4Text: Please pay the fee for your chosen membership and keep the transfer confirmation ready.
join.step5Text: Email us the completed membership form and the transfer confirmation as PDFs. We’ll contact you personally with the next steps.
join.memberContactSubtitle: For questions or to send your documents, feel free to contact us by email.
join.pAdultVal: €20 in the first year, then €15 per year
join.pReducedVal: €17 in the first year, then €15 per year

about.title: About us
about.lead: Who we are, what we stand for — and why Penya Blaugrana Graz exists.
about.storySubtitle: Official FC Barcelona Penya in Graz
about.p1: We are an official FC Barcelona Penya, founded in 2025 in Graz–Seiersberg. Our community brings together people from all across Styria who share one passion: FC Barcelona.
about.p2: Our mission is to bring the club’s values and passion to life here in our region. Whether we watch matches together, discuss tactics, or celebrate big victories — we always stand united behind Barça.
about.p3: Everyone is warmly welcome. We’re looking forward to many unforgettable blaugrana moments!
